## blockRendering.ConstantProvider.FIELD\_TEXT\_BASELINE property

Text baseline. This constant is dynamically set in \`\`<!-- -->setFontConstants\_<!-- -->\`\` to be the baseline of the text based on the font used.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
FIELD_TEXT_BASELINE: number;
```
